about_the_game:
In well-established, stable parts of the galaxy, larger trading companies handle the bulk of interstellar transportation. However, there is always demand and for smaller deliveries as well - orders from remote areas, for niche or dangerous goods, or just because some clients names tend to get messed up in bookkeeping. That's where peddlers come in.

Peddlers Between Pulsars is a narrative based RPG where you can play as one of five peddlers - each with their own viewpoints and reasons for wanting to squeeze a living off their cargo ships.

  • Neon - A gas based alien that is more comfortable with verbal species than its own.
  • Malady - An energetic, friendly mollusk with a shell of solid gold and copper.
  • Exos - A member of an aggressive, nomadic beetle species.
  • Gitrah - Plant/Fungi symbiotic duo, who found
  • Aerin - Member of an ancient, isolationist species.

name: Peddlers Between Pulsars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A story based RPG where you play as a cargo ship owner that travels between planets with other peddlers.
